meanings.sent1: She was foreknowing the outcome of the test before it even started.
meanings.sent2: He always foreknows what his friends are planning before they tell him.
meanings.sent3: The psychic cat was foreknowing the treats hidden in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition was like a superpower, foreknowing dangers before they even appeared.
meanings.sent5: The ancient oracle was famous for foreknowing the fate of kings and kingdoms.

meanings.sent1: The foreknowing professor accurately predicted the outcome of the experiment.
meanings.sent2: She possessed a foreknowing ability to anticipate market trends.
meanings.sent3: The foreknowing weather app claimed it could predict rainbows.
meanings.sent4: His foreknowing gaze seemed to pierce through the veil of time.
meanings.sent5: The foreknowing owl hooted ominously as the storm approached.
